summary: This is a notice of docket activity from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals for the case Giuffre v. Maxwell (20-2413). It records the filing of a 'Notice of Hearing Date Acknowledgment' on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell and lists the attorneys of record and parties to be electronically notified.

events.title: Notice of Hearing Date Acknowledgment Filed
events.description: A Notice of Hearing Date Acknowledgment was filed on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell in the appellate case Giuffre v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is a docket notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals for case 20-2413, Giuffre v. Maxwell.
Ghislaine Maxwell is the appellant in the case, indicating an ongoing appeal process.
A large list of attorneys, including David Boies and Sigrid McCawley, are listed as counsel to be notified of the filing.
The document shows the procedural step of acknowledging a hearing date in Maxwell's appeal.
